overview: When Brandi gets a new computer and decides to start an online lingerie company, her husband Alex thinks it's a great idea and takes it one step further - he helps her set up a live video feed. Things get hotter than Brandi and Alex ever imagined when the feed gets out of control while Veronica and Jim, a wealthy and eccentric couple are watching. Getting their own hot ideas, the couple decides to build a competitive website that sparks a sexy back and forth with Brandi that culminates in the ultimate online fantasy show. Get ready to watch - everyone wants to.
tagline: Who Said Staying Home Was Boring?
title: A Housewife Named Brandi
